detail_desc: Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Tankini. Fully lined top with a print motif on the front and narrow, crossover shoulder straps. Fully lined bottoms with a contrasting colour lining.

Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Fitted sports vest top in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.

Short swim shorts in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button and zip fly. Elastication at the back of the waist, a concealed drawstring, side pockets, a zipped welt back pocket, and short slits in the sides of the hems.
Tube scarf in thermal fleece. Length 19 cm at the back and 28 cm at the front.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and seams at the waist and on the skirt for added width. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping weave with a V-neck, concealed fastening at the front, short cap sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Ribbed leggings with soft elastication at the waist.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit wool blend in a long, slightly wider style. Buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit. Width 25 cm, circumference 125 cm.

Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Pull-on trousers in a soft cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, covered buttons down the front and 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Dress in light sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Pull-on trousers in washed, stretch twill with an elasticated, drawstring waist, front pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, inset lace detail down the front, and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a flare at the cuffs.
Short, fitted dress in glittery-patterned jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Metal earrings and ear cuffs in various designs. The zinc in the metal is recycled.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Fine-knit bolero in a soft cotton blend containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with a button placket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a concealed fastening at the crotch, and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved dress in sweatshirt fabric with a visible seam at the waist, patch front pockets and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif on the front, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and short slits in the sides.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Cashmere jumper with a stand-up collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length shorts in patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets, back pockets and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless, cropped top in ribbed jersey. Narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front.

Short shorts in a textured cotton and viscose weave with a high paper bag waist that is elasticated at the back. Pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, fly with a concealed zip and button, and side pockets.
Large scarf in a soft, rib-knit wool blend.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a contrasting colour press-stud placket and ribbing.
Fitted strappy top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft wool blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Thong body in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, concealed zip at the back and long raglan sleeves.
Swimming goggles with glittery plastic frames, tinted lenses and an adjustable silicone strap at the back.
Patterned bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Scarf in a soft, airy weave containing some wool with fringing along the short sides.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a regular, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt and side pockets.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Dress in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and small embroidery detail at the top. Short puff sleeves and a bell-shaped skirt.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck, button placket and butterfly sleeves.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
Trousers in woven fabric with a regular elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved lace nursing dress. Wrapover front with a jersey inner top for easier nursing access. Jersey lining.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No fasteners. Lined.
Fitted top in soft, patterned organic cotton piqué. Collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in soft organic cotton slub jersey with decorative buttons at the front, an elasticated waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets. Regular fit.

Romper suit in woven fabric with frills at the top, buttons at the back and narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Wide legs with narrow elastication at the hems, and press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Metal eyelets and crossover lacing at the back and sides. Lined.
Short dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back. long sleeves with buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, fleece-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, front pockets and ribbed cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Short trenchcoat in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with decorative shoulder tabs, a small stand-up collar and draped lapels. Side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Tie in jacquard-weave satin. Width 5.5 cm.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut coat in felted cotton with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and flap side pockets. Unlined.
Hoop earrings decorated with faceted glass stones in various shapes. Diameter 5 cm.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a coloured stripe down the sides. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Short, gently fitted dungaree dress in stretch denim with buttons down the front, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam at the waist with patch pockets. Unlined.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a crossover straps at the back and an elasticated hem.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, a welt back pocket and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
